response.overview: “The title itself contains a Buddhist-like koan. Fascinating how breaking ‘apart’ the word brings us into coherence as ‘a part’ of nature. A linguistic mystery visualized, eyes wide open. This must be the footage from the Amazon(?) you mentioned some months ago that you recalibrated to provide a POV experience of merging with the rowboat paddling through the jungle grasses, bringing us into kinship with the riverway. I loved seeing the wildlife cam footage of the bear and the mountain lion…your stewardship of the land merging with the travel footage. And the fire sequence resembled a flaming flower!” — KATHLEEN SWEENEY, Eco-Artivist
response.title: APART - A PART
